title: Grant Koontz’s Long, Winding, and Sometimes Graveled Road to the Paris Olympics
content:
The 30-year-old is the lone American male in Olympic track racing this year. How he reached this position is the culmination of a years-long love affair with cycling in all its forms.

Read the full article at Grant Koontz’s Long, Winding, and Sometimes Graveled Road to the Paris Olympics  on Velo.
author: Will Tracy
